description: The deadline for the sending your application is 16 Aug 2021. This scholarship is provided by University of Queensland (UQ) and the value of this scholarship is Partial Funding, $28,597 per annum . This scholarship is open for: Open to all nationals.

the deadline for the sending your application is 15 Jun 2021. This scholarship is provided by Heidelberg University and the value of this scholarship is Partial Funding, USD 5,000/sem (for Masters program students).

The scholarship covers 100% tuition feesMedical Insurance If you have family or children, you can take them with you Available for all levels of study, from bachelor's and master's degrees t has no upper age limit Study in the best university in the world nd many more features.

These scholarships are funded in New Zealand, and all applicants selected for the Maters program will receive a stipend of NZ$7000 - NZ$10,000 towards full tuition fees For the undergraduate programme, the award value will be NZD 5000 The award value for the Lincoln International University Merit Scholarship will be NZD 2500 The scholarship value will be NZ$3,000 for undergraduate programmes.
